name: GambleDungeon
description:
Explore the Dungeon with your supercool DICE!

You can find 6 plates which you can add to your dice. The plates have different effects on the player. Important to know is, that you only can use the effect of one plate at the same time. The effect can be gambled on the dice-station. The gambled plate also recives a upgrade on the station everytime you gamble it. So... have fun leveling your plates and beating the game!

----

Controls:

Move: WASD/Arrows

Jump: Spacebar

Cancel: Escape

Select: Left Mouse Button

Deselect: Right Mouse Button

Fullscreen: F4

----
